articles.name: Articles
articles.title: The Kyrgyzstan: on Culture, Traditions, and Nature
articles.description: Explore the rich culture, vibrant traditions, and breathtaking nature of Kyrgyzstan through these insightful stories. From ancient traditions like burkut hunting and kok-boru to the majestic Alabai dogs and the adventurous Taigan, delve into the heart of Kyrgyz culture.
